speaker: Archmage
lines: The Archmage's chamber is smaller than rumors and larger than most rooms.
Shelves stagger under objects that may be trophies or warnings.
The window shows weather being edited.
A kettle refuses to boil until the lecture ends.
'Apprentice,' the Archmage says, even if you are not.
'You've been in rooms you shouldn't and out of rooms you should.'
The kettle boils just enough to punctuate.
'Make your case. The college prefers to be proud of you.'

choices.text: Present your permits and what you didn't take.
Hide the ampoule and change the subject.
Ask for more time and go train.
